entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking pale and sweaty, similar to when he accidentally put a slug-vomiting charm on himself. (Excerpt: 'He looked just as pale and sweaty  as he had done then...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to encourage Ron with breakfast, and also trying to get him past the Slytherin table quickly. (Excerpts: 'You just need some breakfast,' Harry said bracingly. ... He tried to see what was written on the badges...')

entities.name: slitherin
entities.description: The Slytherin house is described as wearing silver badges in the shape of crowns. (Excerpt: 'As they passed the Slytherin table there was an upsurge of noise; Harry looked around and saw that nearly everyone there was wearing...')

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The Gryffindor house is described as giving a rousing welcome to Ron and Harry. (Excerpt: 'They received a rousing welcome at the Gryffindor table...')

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is described as filling up with people, talk, and noise. (Excerpt: 'The Great Hall was filling up fa st when they arrived, the talk louder and the mood more exuberant than usual.')

relationships.description: Harry is encouraging Ron to eat breakfast. (Excerpt: 'You just need some breakfast,' Harry said bracingly.)
Harry is trying to get Ron past the Slytherin table quickly. (Excerpt: 'He tried to see what was written on the badges...')
The Slytherin house is welcoming Ron, as evidenced by their waving and laughing. (Excerpt: 'For some  reason many of them waved at Ron, laughing uproariously.')
The Gryffindor house is welcoming Ron. (Excerpt: 'They received a rousing welcome at the Gryffindor table...')
